name: Pancake Simulator (Alec T)
description:
the perfect pancake
cooked ten seconds on each side
so gold and fluffy

Could you make 3 perfect pancakes and place them on the plate for me? Pickup and use items with left click, then drop the utensil with right click when you're done with it.

Use the Funnel to drop the batter onto the griddle. The perfect size is not too small or too big, should fill about 2/3 the plate.

The Spatula is there to flip the pancakes. Be sure to get that golden brown on each side! Be sure not to forget about a pancake or it'll burn.

Finally use the Tongs to grab your pancake and place it on the plate. Once you place 3 it's game over and I'll review how you did! So be careful to only use your best products. How close can you get to a perfect 100%?
